Mike Pence says he won't run for presidency U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on a run for the presidency but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' interview, Simon Cowell talked about The X Factor launch in America. With auditions set to begin on March 27th in Los Angeles, people can register online now by going to Fox.com/ thexfactor. We actually do the auditions in arenas where you have to perform in front of 4,000-5,000 people. It's a long day. You'll begin to understand why I become very grumpy, Simon Cowell told Nancy O'Dell during the ET interview that aired tonight on ABC. The X Factor auditions are open to vocal groups and solo singers, over the age of 12- and there's no upper age limit.

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said.
